Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: Temporarily increases the movement speed of a Zealot by 5.67, to a total of 10.4, allowing Zealots to intercept nearby enemies. Researching the upgrade increases the base movement speed of Zealots to 4.725, making a Zealot as fast as a stimmed Marine.

Blink.name: Blink
Blink.description: Teleports the Stalker to a nearby target location that is not obscured by Fog of War. Ability can only be used once every 7 seconds.

Psionic Transfer.name: Psionic Transfer
Psionic Transfer.description: Projects an invulnerable Shade that can move but cannot attack. After 7 seconds, the Adept teleports to the Shade's location.

Archon Merge.name: Archon Merge
Archon Merge.description: Sacrifices 2 Templar to create an Archon.

Shadow Stride.name: Shadow Stride
Shadow Stride.description: Teleports the Dark Templar to a nearby target location.

Permanent Cloak (dt).name: Permanent Cloak
Permanent Cloak (dt).description: The Dark Templar is permanently cloaked.

Barrier.name: Barrier
Barrier.description: Absorbs up to 100 damage. Lasts for 2 seconds.

Cliff Walk.name: Cliff Walk
Cliff Walk.description: Allows the Colossus to walk up and down cliffs.

Purification Nova.name: Purification Nova
Purification Nova.description: Shoots out a ball of energy that detonates after 2.1 seconds, dealing 145 splash damage and an additional 55 shield damage to nearby ground units and structures. The Disruptor is immobile while this is active. The Disruptor's visual glow is dulled a little bit during cool-down.

Stasis Trap.name: Stasis Trap
Stasis Trap.description: Traps nearby enemies in stasis for 21 seconds. Trapped units cannot be attacked or affected by abilities.

Permanent Cloak (oracle trap).name: Permanent Cloak
Permanent Cloak (oracle trap).description: The Stasis Ward is permanently cloaked.

Detector (observer).name: Detector
Detector (observer).description: The Observer is a Detector unit that can see cloaked, burrowed and hallucinated units.

Surveillance Mode.name: Surveillance Mode
Surveillance Mode.description: Transforms the Observer to Surveillance Mode. The Observer gains 25% wider vision, but loses the ability to move.

Observer Mode.name: Observer Mode
Observer Mode.description: Transforms the Observer to standard Observer Mode. Allows the Observer to move at the cost of decreased sight radius.

Prismatic Alignment.name: Prismatic Alignment
Prismatic Alignment.description: Realigns the Void Ray's Prismatic Beam to gain +6 damage vs. armored units for 14.3 seconds. While Prismatic Alignment is active, movement speed is reduced by 25%.

Phasing Mode.name: Phasing Mode
Phasing Mode.description: Transforms the Warp Prism to Phasing Mode and generates a power radius similar to that of a Pylon. The Warp Prism cannot move in this mode.

Transport Mode.name: Transport Mode
Transport Mode.description: The Warp Prism returns to being a mobile transport. Takes 2 seconds to revert.

Load (warp prism).name: Load
Load (warp prism).description: The Warp Prism has a cargo space of 8.

Build Interceptor.name: Build Interceptor
Build Interceptor.description: Builds up to 8 Interceptors that automatically attack the Carrier's target. Carriers may not attack without interceptors. Auto-build is enabled by default.

Cloaking Field.name: Cloaking Field
Cloaking Field.description: The Mothership cloaks all nearby units and buildings.

Transform to Warpgate.name: Transform to Warpgate
Transform to Warpgate.description: Transforms the Gateway into a Warp Gate.

Transform to Gateway.name: Transform to Gateway
Transform to Gateway.description: The Warpgate transforms back into a Gateway.

Detector (photon cannon).name: Detector
Detector (photon cannon).description: The Photon Cannon is a Detector structure that can see cloaked, burrowed and hallucinated units.

Repair.name: Repair
Repair.description: SCVs and MULEs can Repair friendly mechanical units and Terran buildings.

Stimpack.name: Stimpack
Stimpack.description: Increases the movement speed and firing rate by 50% at the cost of 10 HP for a Marine or 20 HP for a Marauder.

Concussive Shells.name: Concussive Shells
Concussive Shells.description: Slows an enemy's movement speed by 50% when hit by the Marauder's attack. The slowing effect does not stack, but the timer is refreshed by subsequent hits. Massive units are immune to the slow.

Jet Pack.name: Jet Pack
Jet Pack.description: Allows Reapers to travel up and down cliffs.

Combat Drugs.name: Combat Drugs
Combat Drugs.description: Heals 2.8 HP every second if the Reaper is not attacked for 7 seconds.

KD8 Charge.name: KD8 Charge
KD8 Charge.description: Explodes after a short delay, dealing 5 damage and knocking back nearby units.

Tac Nuke Strike.name: Tac Nuke Strike
Tac Nuke Strike.description: Calls down a Nuclear strike at a target location. Nukes take 14 seconds to land, but they deal up to 300 (+200 vs. structures) damage in a large radius.

Hellbat Mode.name: Hellbat Mode
Hellbat Mode.description: Transforms the Hellion into its Hellbat form. Requires an Armory.

Hellion Mode.name: Hellion Mode
Hellion Mode.description: Transforms the Hellbat into its Hellion form.

Activate Mine.name: Activate Mine
Activate Mine.description: Burrows the Widow Mine and readies the weapon. Cannot move while activated.

Deactivate Mine.name: Deactivate Mine
Deactivate Mine.description: Unburrows the Widow Mine and deactivates its weapon, allowing it to move.

Sentinel Missiles.name: Sentinel Missiles
Sentinel Missiles.description: Attacks by launching missiles at enemy ground and air units that get too close. Missiles deal 125 (+35 vs. shields) damage to their primary target, and 40 (+25 vs. shields) splash damage to units nearby.

Lock On.name: Lock On
Lock On.description: Locks the Cyclone's weapons on the target unit, dealing 400 damage over 14 seconds to ground and flying targets. Can move while firing. Cancels if target moves out of range.

Siege Mode.name: Siege Mode
Siege Mode.description: Deploys into Siege Mode. In this mode, Siege Tanks have very long range and inflict area damage. Siege Tanks in this mode cannot move or attack targets at close range.

Tank Mode.name: Tank Mode
Tank Mode.description: Reverts to Tank Mode. In this mode, Siege Tanks can move, but they do less damage.

High Impact Payload.name: High Impact Payload
High Impact Payload.description: Activates the Thor's 250mm Punisher Cannons, which strike a single air target for heavy damage.

Explosive Payload.name: Explosive Payload
Explosive Payload.description: Arms the Thor's Javelin missile launchers, which deal splash damage to nearby air units and additional damage to Light units.

Assault Mode.name: Assault Mode
Assault Mode.description: Transforms the Viking into Assault Mode where it becomes a Ground unit with a ground attack.

Fighter Mode (viking).name: Fighter Mode
Fighter Mode (viking).description: Transforms the Viking into Fighter Mode where it becomes an Air unit with an anti-air attack.

Defender Mode.name: Defender Mode
Defender Mode.description: Deploys into Defender Mode. In this mode, Liberators inflict single target damage to ground units. Liberators in this mode cannot move.

Fighter Mode (liberator).name: Fighter Mode
Fighter Mode (liberator).description: Reverts to Fighter Mode. In this mode, Liberators can move, but they can only target air units.

Detector (Raven).name: Detector
Detector (Raven).description: The Raven is a Detector unit that can see cloaked, burrowed and hallucinated units.

Load (medivac).name: Load
Load (medivac).description: The Medivac has a cargo space of 8.

Ignite Afterburners.name: Ignite Afterburners
Ignite Afterburners.description: Speed boost that increases Medivac's movement speed and acceleration to 5.94 for 4.3 seconds.

Tactical Jump.name: Tactical Jump
Tactical Jump.description: After 4 seconds, warps to the target location. Battlecruiser is invincible while warping. Stuns and puts the Battlecruiser into a 1 second vulnerability phase before it teleports. In this state, the Battlecruiser can be damaged, but Tactical Jump may not be canceled.

Yamato Cannon.name: Yamato Cannon
Yamato Cannon.description: Blasts a target with a devastating plasma cannon, causing 240 damage.

Load (CC).name: Load
Load (CC).description: Enables the Terran player to load SCV's into a Command Center or Planetary Fortress.

Lift off.name: Lift off
Lift off.description: Lifts off a building, making it airborne and mobile. Can be used by Command Center, Orbital Command, Barracks, Factory and Starport.

Land.name: Land
Land.description: Lands a building at the target location. Can be used by Command Center, Orbital Command, Barracks, Factory and Starport.

Radar.name: Radar
Radar.description: Enemies under fog of war within the range of the Sensor Tower are marked with a red symbol displaying an exclamation mark.

Lower/Raise.name: Lower/Raise
Lower/Raise.description: Lowers/Raises the Supply Depot, allowing/preventing ground units from moving across it. If multiple Supply Depots in different states were selected, the first selected determines whether all would be lowered or raised.

Load (bunker).name: Load
Load (bunker).description: The Bunker can load SCVs, Marines, Marauders, Reapers, and Ghosts, protecting them from fire. Has a cargo space of 4 (+2 with upgrade).

Salvage.name: Salvage
Salvage.description: Destroys the building and returns 75% of its cost. Cannot be cancelled once activated.

Detector (Missile turret).name: Detector
Detector (Missile turret).description: The Missile Turret is a Detector structure that can see cloaked, burrowed and hallucinated units.

Burrow.name: Burrow
Burrow.description: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection. Requires Burrow researched at Hatchery, Lair, or Hive

Unburrow.name: Unburrow
Unburrow.description: Returns the unit above ground to regain offensive capabilities.

Morph to Baneling.name: Morph to Baneling
Morph to Baneling.description: This ability morphs a Zergling into a Baneling. Requires a Baneling Nest.

Explode.name: Explode
Explode.description: The Baneling detonates where it is standing, damaging nearby enemy units and structures.

Enable Building Attack.name: Enable Building Attack
Enable Building Attack.description: The Baneling will target buildings like any other unit does.

Disable Building Attack.name: Disable Building Attack
Disable Building Attack.description: The Baneling will no longer target buildings.

Rapid Regeneration.name: Rapid Regeneration
Rapid Regeneration.description: While burrowed, the Roach regenerates its health at an extremely fast rate of 7 hit points per second.

Morph to Ravager.name: Morph to Ravager
Morph to Ravager.description: Morphs the Roach into a Ravager.

Corrosive Bile.name: Corrosive Bile
Corrosive Bile.description: Launch a missile at the target location, dealing 60 damage to all units and destroying all Force Fields in the area upon impact.

Disguise.name: Disguise
Disguise.description: The Changeling will transform into a basic unit of the enemy that is near (Marine, Zergling, Zealot). The Changeling will also copy the upgraded models of those units (Combat Shield, Metabolic Boost).

Morph to Lurker.name: Morph to Lurker
Morph to Lurker.description: Morphs the Hydralisk into a Lurker. Requires a Lurker Den.

Spawn Locusts.name: Spawn Locusts
Spawn Locusts.description: Spawns 2 Locusts. Locusts have a 18-second timed life.

Swoop.name: Swoop
Swoop.description: Orders the Locust to land at the targeted location, allowing it to attack.

Frenzied.name: Frenzied
Frenzied.description: Zerg unit is immune to snare, stun, mind control, and movement altering effects.

Generate Creep.name: Generate Creep
Generate Creep.description: Makes the Overlord start to generate creep. Creep will only be generated when the Overlord isn't moving.

Mutate Ventral Sacs.name: Mutate Ventral Sacs
Mutate Ventral Sacs.description: Enables the Overlord to transport units. Requires a Lair.

Morph to Overseer.name: Morph to Overseer
Morph to Overseer.description: Morphs the selected Overlord into an Overseer. Requires Lair.

Load (overlord).name: Load
Load (overlord).description: The Overlord has a cargo space of 8. Overlords can use the Load ability only after mutating Ventral Sacs.

Detector (overseer).name: Detector
Detector (overseer).description: The Overseer is a Detector unit that can see cloaked, burrowed and hallucinated units.

Oversight.name: Oversight
Oversight.description: Grants the Overseer 25% wider vision, but removes its ability to move. This ability can be canceled after activation.

Cancel Oversight.name: Cancel Oversight
Cancel Oversight.description: Restores the Overseer's ability to move and returns its vision to its normal radius.

Tissue Regeneration.name: Tissue Regeneration
Tissue Regeneration.description: Mutalisk health regeneration rate increased to 1.4 HP/second.

Morph to Brood Lord.name: Morph to Brood Lord
Morph to Brood Lord.description: Morphs the Corruptor into a Brood Lord. Requires a Greater Spire.

Caustic Spray.name: Caustic Spray
Caustic Spray.description: Emits a stream of acid that deals 7 damage per second for 4.29 seconds, then increases to 35 damage per second. Can only target Structures.

Swarm Seeds.name: Swarm Seeds
Swarm Seeds.description: Spawns Broodlings upon each of the Brood Lord's attacks.

Consume.name: Consume
Consume.description: Targets friendly structure and consumes 200 life over 14 seconds converting the damage dealt into 50 energy. Excluded targets: Creep Tumor

Uproot.name: Uproot
Uproot.description: Allows the Spine Crawler and Spore Crawler to Uproot and Burrow in a new location. While uprooted, the Crawler has a speed of 1 off creep and 2.5 on creep. Uprooted Spore Crawlers do not have detection.

Root (spine).name: Root
Root (spine).description: Allows the Spine Crawler to Root itself to the ground, gaining attack ability. Can be performed only on Creep.

Root (spore).name: Root
Root (spore).description: Allows the Spore Crawler to Root itself to the ground, gaining attack ability. Can be performed only on Creep.

Load (nydus).name: Load
Load (nydus).description: The Nydus Worms and Nydus Networks can load a maximum of 255 ground units into a shared underground network.

Detector (spore).name: Detector
Detector (spore).description: The Spore Crawler is a Detector structure that can see cloaked, burrowed and hallucinated units.

Force Field.name: Force Field
Force Field.description: Barrier that lasts 11 seconds and impedes movement of ground units. Massive units will shatter Force Fields on contact. Hallucinated Massive units cannot shatter Force Fields.

Guardian Shield.name: Guardian Shield
Guardian Shield.description: Creates a range 4.5 aura that reduces incoming ranged damage to friendly units by 2. Lasts 11 seconds.

Hallucination.name: Hallucination
Hallucination.description: Creates hallucinations of Protoss units at the caster's location, that cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage, and die more easily. Enemy detectors can reveal hallucinations.

Feedback.name: Feedback
Feedback.description: Drains all energy from target unit. Deals 0.5 damage per point of energy drained this way.

Psionic Storm.name: Psionic Storm
Psionic Storm.description: Creates a storm of psionic energy that lasts 2.85 seconds, causing up to 80 damage to all units in the target area.

Graviton Beam.name: Graviton Beam
Graviton Beam.description: Makes the target unit float in the air, disabling its abilities. Massive units are immune.

Revelation.name: Revelation
Revelation.description: Causes enemy units and structures within the target area to grant vision for 20 seconds. Reveals cloaked or burrowed units and structures.

Stasis Ward.name: Stasis Ward
Stasis Ward.description: Places a cloaked Stasis Ward at the target location that lasts 170 seconds. Once activated by an enemy ground unit, the ward traps nearby enemies in stasis for 21.5 seconds. Trapped units cannot be attacked or affected by abilities.

Activate Pulsar Beam.name: Activate Pulsar Beam
Activate Pulsar Beam.description: Charges the Oracle's Pulsar Beam, which does 15 (+7 vs Light) spell damage to ground units while active.

Mass Recall (Mothership).name: Mass Recall
Mass Recall (Mothership).description: Recalls all player units in the target area to the Mothership.

Time Warp.name: Time Warp
Time Warp.description: After a 1.79 second delay, warps spacetime within the target area for 7 seconds. Enemy units and structures within the field will have attack and movement speeds reduced by 50%.

Chrono Boost.name: Chrono Boost
Chrono Boost.description: Places target structure in a Chrono Boost, causing it to operate 50% faster for 20 seconds.

Strategic Recall.name: Strategic Recall
Strategic Recall.description: Recalls all units owned by the player in the target area to the Nexus.

Battery Overcharge.name: Battery Overcharge
Battery Overcharge.description: Overcharges a target Shield Battery near a Nexus, increasing its shield restoration rate by 100% and allowing it to restore shields without consuming energy for 14 seconds. Can be casted on any Battery within 8 range of any friendly Nexus.

Restore.name: Restore
Restore.description: Restores target unit or structure's shields. Restores 3 shields per 1 energy, 50.4 shields per second. Auto-cast by default. Autocasting targets units and defensive structures only.

Steady Targeting.name: Steady Targeting
Steady Targeting.description: After carefully aiming for 1.43 seconds while not taking damage, the Ghost fires a sniper round dealing 170 damage. Ignores armor. Can only target biological units.

Cloak (Ghost).name: Cloak
Cloak (Ghost).description: The Ghost becomes invisible until it runs out of energy or the player cancels Cloak.

EMP Round.name: EMP Round
EMP Round.description: The Ghost fires an EMP Round that removes up to 100 shields and energy from every unit and building within the AoE. Also reveals cloaked units.

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description: The Medivac automatically (or on order) heals a close-by friendly biological unit.

Build Auto-Turret.name: Build Auto-Turret
Build Auto-Turret.description: The Raven drops an Auto-Turret at the target location.

Interference Matrix.name: Interference Matrix
Interference Matrix.description: Disables a target unit rendering it unable to attack or use abilities for 11 seconds. Reveals Cloaked units. Can only target mechanical and psionic units.

Anti-Armor Missile.name: Anti-Armor Missile
Anti-Armor Missile.description: Deploys a Missile which pursues the target unit, and, upon contact, reduces the armor and shield armor of affected units by 3 for 21 seconds.

Cloak (Banshee).name: Cloak
Cloak (Banshee).description: The Banshee cloaks itself, turning invisible until it runs out of energy.

Calldown: MULE.name: Calldown: MULE
Calldown: MULE.description: The Orbital Command calls down a MULE via Drop Pods. Mules can gather minerals at a faster rate than SCVs, and last for 64 seconds. One MULE and one SCV gather from the same mineral patch simultaneously.

Calldown: Extra Supplies.name: Calldown: Extra Supplies
Calldown: Extra Supplies.description: The Orbital Command calls down additional supplies which permanently increase a Supply Depot's supply limit by 8.

Scanner Sweep.name: Scanner Sweep
Scanner Sweep.description: The Orbital Command scans a target location on the map revealing cloaked, burrowed or hallucinated units temporarily.

Spawn Larva.name: Spawn Larva
Spawn Larva.description: The Queen injects 3 Larva eggs into a Hatchery which after 29 seconds, hatch and 3 Larvae are ready to be used at the targeted Hatchery. If a Hatchery has more than 19 Larva, additional Larva will not be created. This will stack and queue if the target is already spawning additional larvae.

Spawn Creep Tumor.name: Spawn Creep Tumor
Spawn Creep Tumor.description: The Queen moves to and places a Creep Tumor at the targeted location. The tumor has 50 hit points and generates Creep. Each Creep Tumor can spawn one other Creep Tumor within a radius of 10.

Transfusion.name: Transfusion
Transfusion.description: Instantly heals a target friendly, biological unit or structure for 75 health. An additional 50 health regenerates over 7 seconds.

Neural Parasite.name: Neural Parasite
Neural Parasite.description: The Infestor temporarily takes control of target enemy unit. The player can cancel this ability, or it will automatically cancel if the controlling Infestor is killed or the targeted unit is moved out of 14 range. Can not target Heroic units.

Fungal Growth.name: Fungal Growth
Fungal Growth.description: Target units take 30 damage over 3 seconds and have movement speed reduced by 75%. Reveals cloaked and burrowed units. Affected units cannot Blink, Tactical Jump, or load into transports or buildings.

Microbial Shroud.name: Microbial Shroud
Microbial Shroud.description: Creates a shroud that obscures ground units underneath, reducing damage taken from air units by 50%. Lasts 11 seconds.

Spawn Changeling.name: Spawn Changeling
Spawn Changeling.description: Spawn a Changeling, a small unit with timed life and no attack. When a Changeling first encounters an enemy unit, it will match that unit's color and change into a Zealot, Marine, or Zergling, depending on the enemy race.

Contaminate.name: Contaminate
Contaminate.description: The Overseer covers an enemy structure in slime. The structure will be unable to train units or research upgrades for 21 seconds.

Blinding Cloud.name: Blinding Cloud
Blinding Cloud.description: Creates a cloud for 5.71 seconds that reduces attack range of ground units and structures underneath to melee range.

Abduct.name: Abduct
Abduct.description: Pulls a target unit to the location of the Viper.

Parasitic Bomb.name: Parasitic Bomb
Parasitic Bomb.description: Creates a parasitic cloud that deals 120 damage over 7 seconds to the target and enemy air units nearby. If the target dies, the cloud remains in the air where the enemy died until it expires.

Envision.name: Envision
Envision.description: Grants detection within the Oracle’s sight range.

Vortex.name: Vortex
Vortex.description: Creates a Vortex at the target location. All units within 2.5 of the targeted area are sucked into the Vortex until it ends. Units released from the Vortex are then immune for 1.5 seconds.

Mass Recall (Mothership OLD).name: Mass Recall
Mass Recall (Mothership OLD).description: Teleports the Mothership or Mothership Core and all nearby units owned by the player to the targeted Nexus.

Photon Overcharge.name: Photon Overcharge
Photon Overcharge.description: Has to be cast on a Pylon. It grants the Pylon the ability to attack air and ground units and buildings for 30 damage and a range of 7 with a weapon speed of 0.714.

Sniper Round.name: Sniper Round
Sniper Round.description: The Ghost snipes a single, biological unit for 25(+25 vs psionic) damage. This ability can be queued for multiple snipes.

250mm Strike Cannons.name: 250mm Strike Cannons
250mm Strike Cannons.description: The Thor focuses a single target channeling 500 damage over 6 seconds and stunning the target for 6. It can be used against buildings. The Thor must enter and exit 250mm Strike Cannons mode, which takes 2 seconds each.

Seeker Missile.name: Seeker Missile
Seeker Missile.description: Missile rapidly moves and explodes at the target, causing 30/15/7.5 splash damage in 0.72/1.44/2.88 radius and reducing the armor of affected units by -3 (can make armor negative). Targeted unit lights up red when targeted. Can be fully dodged by teleport abilities and loading units inside structures.

Build Point Defense Drone.name: Build Point Defense Drone
Build Point Defense Drone.description: The Raven drops a Point Defense Drone at the target location.

Point Defense Laser.name: Point Defense Laser
Point Defense Laser.description: Automated defensive laser that intercepts enemy projectiles. Effective against Marauders, Vikings, Banshees, Battlecruisers, Thors, Missile Turrets, Stalkers, Phoenixes, Photon Cannons, Queens, Mutalisks, Corruptors, Hydralisks, Spore Crawlers.

Yamato Cannon (OLD).name: Yamato Cannon
Yamato Cannon (OLD).description: The Battlecruiser's Yamato Cannon fires an intense blast of concentrated energy at the target, dealing 300 points of damage.

Infested Terran.name: Infested Terran
Infested Terran.description: Spawns an Infested Swarm Egg, which takes 5 seconds to hatch and has 70 health. An Infested Terran has 50 health, lives for 21 seconds and has a ranged attack.
